name: Radio 360
overview:
In an environment of steady declines in the amount of time people spend listening to terrestrial radio – coupled with online music services that fail to secure an emotional bond with the listener – Radio 360 is the first platform to offer a way for both traditional radio stations and socially engaged consumer brands to monetize their enduring relationships with consumers using the emotional connection to music.  

Radio 360 is a subscription-based online music player that creates a personalized listening experience by enabling listeners to add and delete songs, artists and albums; mix genres; and discover and share new music. The player combines the professional music curation of traditional radio with the personalization and simplicity made possible by technology. Proprietary software enables Radio 360 to uniquely engage its fans and keep them listening by tapping into their emotional connections with music. This product is not tied to a particular device, rather an experience.  

More than 130 million people have walked away from Pandora and we know why.  Radio 360 provides an unparalleled personalized music experience, while the efficient cost structure provides strategic flexibility as market dynamics fluctuate.
